intro.ch: 致力于AR、MR眼镜的技术研发，互联网科技领域内的技术开发，MR眼镜硬件及辅助设备的设计、开发、生产、销售一体系，将MR增强现实融入人们的生活当中，创新、探索更深度虚拟世界和现实生活的融合。
intro.en: Committed to the technology research and development of AR, MR glasses, the technology development in the field of internet technology, the system of MR glasses hardware and auxiliary equipment design, development, production and sales, the MR augmented reality into people's life, the innovation and explore more depth of the fusion of virtual world and real life.

address.ch: 张江高科技园区盛夏路 570号12楼1202-A室
address.en: ZHANGJIANG-INNOPARK Room 1202-A, 12 / F,  NO.570 Shengxia RD
